rules.title: Be respectful to all players
rules.description: Treat everyone with kindness and respect. We're all here to have fun together.

rules.title: No griefing or stealing
rules.description: Respect other players' builds and items. Don't destroy, modify, or take what isn't yours.

rules.title: No inappropriate language
rules.description: This is a family-friendly environment. Keep chat clean and appropriate for all ages.

rules.title: No advertising other servers
rules.description: This is our community. Please don't promote other Minecraft servers here.

rules.title: No hacking or cheating
rules.description: Play fair. No modified clients, exploits, or unfair advantages.

rules.title: Follow staff instructions
rules.description: Admins and moderators are here to help. Please respect their decisions.

rules.title: Use land claims
rules.description: Protect your builds with the land claim system. Use /claim to get started.

rules.title: No exploiting bugs
rules.description: Report bugs instead of abusing them. Help us keep the server fair for everyone.

rules.title: Keep chat friendly
rules.description: No spam, arguments, or drama. Keep conversations positive and constructive.

rules.title: Have fun!
rules.description: This is a game - enjoy yourself! We're all here to have a great time.
